titles.title: A resolution congratulating all New Yorkers on the occasion of their first Kentucky Derby victory and the subsequent Preakness Stakes victory with New York-bred gelding, Funny Cide.
A resolution congratulating all New Yorkers on the occasion of their first Kentucky Derby victory and the subsequent Preakness Stakes victory with New York-bred gelding, Funny Cide.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Congratulates Sackatoga Stables for Funny Cide's victories at the 129th Kentucky Derby and the 128th Preakness Stakes.
